additional_info:
Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Elevator, Heating system: electricity, Hot water: electricity 
 Orbi Towers Batumi offers pet-friendly accommodation in Batumi, 400 metres from Aquapark Batumi and 1.7 km from Dolphinarium. The property features views of the sea and is 2 km from Batumi Archeological Museum.
There is a dining area and a kitchen complete with an oven, a toaster and refrigerator. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower and shower.
Holy Mother Virgins Nativity Cathedral is 2.6 km from Orbi Towers Batumi, while Europe Square is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Batumi International Airport, 3 km from Orbi Towers Batumi.
